text: "Just to Satisfy You" is a 1964 song written by Waylon Jennings and Don Bowman. The song was later re-recorded for his 1969 studio album Just to Satisfy You and in 1982 as a duet with Willie Nelson and went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country songs chart. Category:1964 songs Category:Country songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Glen Campbell songs
title: Just to Satisfy You (song)
